p: The predicted species richness is significantly higher inside PAs than outside in all combinations of assumptions (overall mean excess is 10.2 ± 0.6; a one-sample t-test shows this is significantly greater than zero—t 323 = 10.1, p<<0.001: see Fig 4). The overall mean species richness outside the PAs is 39.1, and hence on average there is a 26% increase inside the PA.
